Klopp is prepared to spend a club record sum to bring in a centre-back this summer, but anticipates banking big on Sakho. (@MelissaReddy_)

Liverpool feel they can get close to £30m for Sakho & his sale would offset much of the cost to land someone like Van Dijk. (@MelissaReddy_)

Andre Marriner has been appointed the referee for Liverpool vs Crystal Palace on Sunday -

Marriner sent off James Milner for two bookable offences when the Reds travelled to Palace last season - but he did award Liverpool a last-minute penalty in a 2-1 win.

Marriner has refereed 33 games this season, showing 130 yellow cards and seven reds. He refereed Liverpool’s 5-1 win at home to Hull earlier this season, as well as the 4-2 victory at Crystal Palace.

Alberto Moreno is set to leave, and Klopp will attempt to sign Virgil Van Dijk from Southampton as defensive reinforcements. (Paul Joyce)

Klopp’s first choice to strengthen midfield is Naby Keita and then there is Henderson, Can, Lallana and Wijnaldum. (Paul Joyce)

Lucas Leiva & Daniel Sturridge are set to hold talks with Klopp at the end of the season, while Kevin Stewart is set to leave. (Paul Joyce)
